Class TruncatedTextSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.TruncatedTextSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextSource

    public class TruncatedTextSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextSource
    TextSource that is truncated.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)

      • setContinuationCharacters

        public void setContinuationCharacters(@Nullable
                                      java.lang.CharSequence continuationCharacters)
        Get the continuation characters appended after the truncated text. Defaults to "" ..."".
        Parameters:
        continuationCharacters - the characters. If null, nothing is output after the truncated text.

      • setMaximumLength

        public void setMaximumLength(int maximumLength)
